msbt.message: Hey, are you in the middle of anything right now? Wanna stop by my place and hang out?
Sure, why not? Definitely, let's go!
Eh, not right now. Sorry, I can't.
Hey, you want to stop by my place and give me some positive feedback on my latest design choices?
Sure, why not? Definitely, let's go!
Eh, not right now. Sorry, I can't.
Hey, let's go hang out at my place. I've got furniture that we can sit on.
Sure, why not? Definitely, let's go!
Eh, not right now. Sorry, I can't.
Ah, too bad. Another time!
That's cool. Mi casa es su casa. That's French for maybe another time, !
Hey, no worries. I'll just look forward to the next time that much more.
Great! Alright, down to brass tacks—what's your schedule look like these days?
I'm free, let's go now!
How about tomorrow?
Giddyup! Alright, when are we doing this thing?
Right now!
Let's do tomorrow.
Buenissimo! So, do you want to come over right now, or
Let's go now!
Let's do tomorrow.
No time like the present, eh? I like your style!
Great! Let's skedaddle.
Sounds good to me! Let's hit the road.
Hold up—you've never been to my place before, have you?Oh, that's fine. I definitely don't need to scramble back home right now to clean
You've never been to my place, have you? Well, there's a standard disclaimer I like to hand out I'm just kidding! Anyway
Hold the phone—when did it get so late?Not that I'm opposed to staying up all night chatting, but maybe we should do this another time.
Tomorrow it is! Looking forward to it, .
Got it. I'll be there with Bells on!<10_4 /> Oh, actuallythat outfit is at the dry cleaner right now
Alright, I'll see you tomorrow!
Come on by at the crack of dawn and I'll have a pot of coffee going!Ha HA! Just kidding. You know I need my beauty sleep.
Alright, I can't wait to see how stylishly late you are.
You can come over anytime, but if it's early, I can't promise that I'll be the best I can be.
Wait, I don't think you've been to my place before, have you? Well, never fear, it's completely normal. What do you mean?! How does me saying that make it seem not normal?
Hang on just a secondhave you visited my place before? Didn't think so. Well, there's nothing too weird about it. Come and see for yourself!
You're still coming over to visit tomorrow, right? Anytime's good for me. If it's early, you might catch me doing yoga, though. I'm in warrior pose pretty much all morning.
We made plans for tomorrow, right? You can come over anytime you like.Just, you know, don't leave me hanging until midnight or anything like that, .
You're coming to visit my place tomorrow, remember? Anytime is good—I'm always on!
I just finished cleaning and redecorating my place. Now I need to show it off! Say, You're conveniently standing here. Want to come over for a visit?
Sure, why not?
I'm busy right now.
You know what's boring for me? Being at home alone. I don't know what to do with myself. Totally unrelated—do you want to come over and hang out right now?
Sure!
Sorry, I can't.
Busy, eh? Is that just your way of negotiating? OK, I'll throw in a delicious cup of . No deal, huh? Well, you drive a hard bargain and I respect that.
Ah, no worries. I'll just go look at myself in the mirror for a while.
